text: [[b]]Lady Mi[[/b]]\\nSteadfast Loyalist\\n\\nGerneral Type: {{tr:3k_general_type_earth}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Lady Mi will do anything to protect her family - even if it means sacrificing herself.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Xu Chu[[/b]]\\nTiger Fool\\n\\nGerneral Type: {{tr:3k_general_type_wood}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Xu Chu is a man of simple thoughts and principles, but an impressive warrior who fights with a bestial rage.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Guo Jia[[/b]]\\nAstute Advisor\\n\\nGerneral Type: {{tr:3k_general_type_water}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Guo Jia is a confidant of unparalleled foresight - to ignore his counsel is to invite faliure and defeat.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Xu Huang[[/b]]\\nGuardian of the Gates\\n\\nGerneral Type: {{tr:3k_general_type_metal}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]When assigned to guardianship, Xu Huang is an immovable sentinel, requiring a tremendous effort to bypass.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Da QIao[[/b]]\\nDaughter of the Southlands\\n\\nGerneral Type: {{tr:3k_general_type_earth}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]The south produces boons to its nobles: two daughters, fair of mind and strong of resolve.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Xiao Qiao[[/b]]\\nDaughter of the Southlands\\n\\nGerneral Type: {{tr:3k_general_type_water}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]To the filial and devout, life will give not one, but two meatures of its respect.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Zhang Hong[[/b]]\\nAdept Diplomat\\n\\nGerneral Type: {{tr:3k_general_type_water}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]With a quick wit and unflappable demeanour, Zhang Hongs moves between courts with consummate ease.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Zhang Zhao[[/b]]\\nStern Advisor\\n\\nGerneral Type: {{tr:3k_general_type_water}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Even the mightest warlords need a sharp rebuke from time to time. Zhang Hong can be relied upon to prove it.[[/col]][[/i]]
